bug.author: SiyangXie
bug.description:
I came into this error first time running detect.py to an image: AssertionError: weights/yolov3-spp.weights missing, download from <denchmark-link:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uxgUBemJVw9wZsdpboYbzUN4bcRhsuAI>https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uxgUBemJVw9wZsdpboYbzUN4bcRhsuAI</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/69109629-4d44ce00-0ab3-11ea-905d-b5d6ce12d1bd.png></denchmark-link>
Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows 10

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SiyangXie>@SiyangXie</denchmark-link> the weights should download automatically, but perhaps since you are on windows the pathname difference is causing problems. In any case, you can download them from the link provided in the error message. Place them in your /weights folder and everything will work fine.
